Class NanoWeather

  • java.lang.Object
    • NanoWeather

  • public class NanoWeather
extends java.lang.Object
    External interface for Java programs using the NanoWeather plug-in. Note: The NanoWeatherService interface accepts commands over a socket with each method occupying a single line and in the following format. method(arg1,arg2) method(arg1) method(arg1,arg2,arg3) etc.
    Author:
    VinoSugunan

      • createTemplate

        public static void createTemplate(java.lang.String name,
                                  long imageHeight,
                                  long imageWidth)
        Creates an image template which can be applied to an image for OCR.
        Parameters:
        name - specify an identifier for access to this template.
        imageHeight - height in pixels of typical image using this template.
        imageWidth - width in pixels of typical image using this template.

      • createImage

        public static void createImage(java.lang.String name,
                               java.io.File location,
                               long imageHeight,
                               long imageWidth)
        Creates an image within the plugin.
        Parameters:
        name - specify an identifier for access to this image.
        location - specify the exact file location of this image.
        imageHeight - height in pixels of this image.
        imageWidth - width in pixels of this image.

      • addFieldToTemplate

        public static void addFieldToTemplate(java.lang.String templateName,
                                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                                      long x,
                                      long y,
                                      long fieldHeight,
                                      long fieldWidth)
        Adds a field to this template which will be used for future images using this template.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template which will be updated.
        fieldName - the identifier for access to this field.
        x - the horizontal location on the image where this field begins.
        y - the vertical location on the image where this field begins.
        fieldHeight - the height of the field.
        fieldWidth - the width of the field.

      • addFieldToImage

        public static void addFieldToImage(java.lang.String image,
                                   java.lang.String fieldName,
                                   long x,
                                   long y,
                                   long fieldHeight,
                                   long fieldWidth)
        Adds a field to an image which will be used for scanning this image.
        Parameters:
        image - name of the image which will contain the new field.
        fieldName - the identifier for access to this field.
        x - the horizontal location on the image where this field begins.
        y - the vertical location on the image where this field begins.
        fieldHeight - the height of the field.
        fieldWidth - the width of the field.

      • removeFieldFromTemplate

        public static void removeFieldFromTemplate(java.lang.String templateName,
                                           java.lang.String fieldName)
        Removes a field from a template so that it will no longer be added to images.
        Parameters:
        templateName - name of the template from which this field will be removed.
        fieldName - name of the field which will be removed.

        templateName - identifier of the template which will be applied to the image.

      • recenterTemplateOnImage

        public static void recenterTemplateOnImage(java.lang.String imageName,
                                           long x,
                                           long y)
        Re-centers a template to account for drift between images of similar forms.
        Parameters:
        imageName - The image which is to be adjusted for.
        x - horizontal adjustment of template (+ left, - right).
        y - vertical adjustment of template (+ up, - down).

      • realignFieldOnImage

        public static void realignFieldOnImage(java.lang.String imageName,
                                       java.lang.String fieldName,
                                       long x,
                                       long y)
        Realigns a field to match the location of the field on the image.
        Parameters:
        imageName - The image which is to be adjusted.
        fieldName - The field which will be realigned.
        x - horizontal adjustment of template (+ left, - right).
        y - vertical adjustment of template (+ up, - down).

        Parameters:
        imageName - identifier of the image which will be scanned.

        public static void setImageFieldCharacterSet(java.lang.String imageName,
                                             java.lang.String fieldName,
                                             java.lang.String characterSet)
        Configures a field in an image to only accept characters from a specific character set.
        Parameters:
        imageName - identifier of the image.
        fieldName - identifier of the field.
        characterSet - character set which limits the field.

      • setTemplateFieldCharacterSet

        public static void setTemplateFieldCharacterSet(java.lang.String templateName,
                                                java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                java.lang.String characterSet)
        Configures a field in a template, and all future images it is applied to, so it only accepts characters from a specified character set.
        Parameters:
        templateName - identifier of the template.
        fieldName - identifier of the field.
        characterSet - character set which limits the field.

      • updateImageFieldPriority

                                            java.lang.String fieldName,
                                            int priority)
        Configures the confidence level below which a field in an image will require review.
        Parameters:
        imageName - identifier of the image.
        fieldName - identifier of the field.
        priority - confidence percentage.
